meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. taking; taker; collecting; collector; remover; removal
2. last performer of the day (usu. the star performer); last performance of the day
3. active partner (e.g. in judo demonstration)
4. emphatic or formal prefix before a verb
取 【とり】
1. samurai receiving this much rice as a fee after a quantity
2. offering of rice cake containing this much rice
3. person receiving this amount of money as a salary Obsolete term
取 【どり】
1. appropriation; obtaining Buddhism, See also 十二因縁

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take; to pick up; to grab; to catch お皿に取ったものは全部食べなさい。You'd better eat everything that's on your plate.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to pass; to hand; to give 塩をとっていただけますか。Could you pass me the salt, please?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to get; to obtain; to acquire; to win; to receive; to earn; to take (e.g. a vacation) 彼は数学で満点を取った。He got full marks in mathematics.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to adopt (a method, proposal, etc.); to take (a measure, attitude, etc.); to choose 老人はごう慢な態度をとった。The old man assumed an impudent attitude.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to remove; to get rid of; to take off 肉から脂身を取りなさい。Trim the fat off the meat.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to take away; to steal; to rob

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to eat; to have (e.g. lunch); to take (e.g. vitamins) See also 摂る水分をたくさん取ってください。You should drink a lot of liquid.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to pick (e.g. flowers); to gather; to extract (e.g. juice); to catch (e.g. fish); to harvest (a crop)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to take up (time, space); to occupy; to spare; to set aside 彼は仕事に自分の時間の全てを取られている。Business absorbs all his time.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to secure; to reserve; to save; to put aside; to keep 座席をとっておいてください。Please save my place.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to take (e.g. a joke); to interpret; to understand; to make out; to grasp

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to record; to take down 先生はノートを取ることの大切さを強調した。The teacher stressed the importance of taking notes.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to subscribe to (e.g. a newspaper); to take; to buy; to get どんな雑誌をとっていますか。What magazines do you subscribe to?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to order; to have delivered

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to charge; to fine; to take (tax)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to take (e.g. a wife); to take on (e.g. an apprentice); to adopt; to accept

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to compete (in sumo, cards, etc.); to play

meanings.meaning: 1. transactions; dealings; business
2. Trade Trade is the transfer of ownership of goods and services ... Read more
取り引き 【とりひき】
1. transactions; dealings; business
2. Trade Trade is the transfer of ownership of goods and services ... Read more
取り引き 【とりひき】
1. to exchange; to swap; to barter これを青いのと取り替えてください。Please change this for a blue one.
2. to replace; to substitute 彼らは欠陥テレビを新しいのと取りかえた。They replaced the defective TV with a new one.
取り換える 【とりかえる】、取りかえる 【とりかえる】、取替える 【とりかえる】、取換える 【とりかえる】、取換る 【とりかえる】
取換る: Irregular okurigana usage.
1. to exchange; to swap; to barter これを青いのと取り替えてください。Please change this for a blue one.
2. to replace; to substitute 彼らは欠陥テレビを新しいのと取りかえた。They replaced the defective TV with a new one.
取り換える 【とりかえる】、取りかえる 【とりかえる】、取替える 【とりかえる】、取換える 【とりかえる】、取換る 【とりかえる】
取換る: Irregular okurigana usage.

sentences.translation: Please change this for a blue one.
They replaced the defective TV with a new one.

meanings.meaning: 1. to come off (of a button, handle, lid, etc.) 鋳物が金型からすっぽりとれた。The casting came cleanly out of its mold.

2. to go away (of a fever, pain, swelling, etc.); to disappear; to come out (of a stain); to come off (e.g. of dust); to be removed (e.g. of wrinkles) しびれがとれるまで食事はしないでください。Don't eat till the numbness wears off.
3. to be harvested; to be picked; to be produced; to be caught (of fish); to be obtained; to be extracted オリーブの実から油が取れます。Oil is extracted from olives.
4. to be interpreted (as); to be taken (as); to be understood (as); to be read (as)
5. to be attained (of balance, harmony, etc.); to be achieved ちょっと手を休めて気持ちを和らげれば、肩のストレスや緊張感がとれるよ。If you stop and relax, this will relieve the tension and stress in your shoulders.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to be able to get; to be able to obtain; to be able to secure; to be able to win; to be able to catch See also 取る, potential form of 取るやっと免許が取れました。I got a driver's license at last.
1. to come off (of a button, handle, lid, etc.) 鋳物が金型からすっぽりとれた。The casting came cleanly out of its mold.

2. to go away (of a fever, pain, swelling, etc.); to disappear; to come out (of a stain); to come off (e.g. of dust); to be removed (e.g. of wrinkles) しびれがとれるまで食事はしないでください。Don't eat till the numbness wears off.
3. to be harvested; to be picked; to be produced; to be caught (of fish); to be obtained; to be extracted オリーブの実から油が取れます。Oil is extracted from olives.
4. to be interpreted (as); to be taken (as); to be understood (as); to be read (as)
5. to be attained (of balance, harmony, etc.); to be achieved ちょっと手を休めて気持ちを和らげれば、肩のストレスや緊張感がとれるよ。If you stop and relax, this will relieve the tension and stress in your shoulders.

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to be able to get; to be able to obtain; to be able to secure; to be able to win; to be able to catch See also 取る, potential form of 取るやっと免許が取れました。I got a driver's license at last.

sentences.translation: The casting came cleanly out of its mold.
Don't eat till the numbness wears off.
Oil is extracted from olives.
If you stop and relax, this will relieve the tension and stress in your shoulders.
I got a driver's license at last.

meanings.meaning: 1. to pick up 彼女はガラスの花瓶を取り上げた。She picked up one of the glass vases.
2. to adopt (a proposal); to take up (a topic); to accept; to listen to sometimes written as 採り上げるこのブログは情報インフラを中心としたトピックを取り上げています。This blog covers topics that centre on information infrastructure.
3. to take issue with; to make a problem of; to bring up (as a point of criticism)
4. to report (news); to cover; to feature 全新聞がその事件を大きく取り上げた。All the papers featured the case.
5. to take away; to confiscate; to deprive (someone) of; to revoke; to disqualify; to cancel 向こう見ずな運転の為彼は免許を取り上げられた。He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.
6. to deliver (a baby)
7. to collect (taxes)
1. to pick up 彼女はガラスの花瓶を取り上げた。She picked up one of the glass vases.
2. to adopt (a proposal); to take up (a topic); to accept; to listen to sometimes written as 採り上げるこのブログは情報インフラを中心としたトピックを取り上げています。This blog covers topics that centre on information infrastructure.
3. to take issue with; to make a problem of; to bring up (as a point of criticism)
4. to report (news); to cover; to feature 全新聞がその事件を大きく取り上げた。All the papers featured the case.
5. to take away; to confiscate; to deprive (someone) of; to revoke; to disqualify; to cancel 向こう見ずな運転の為彼は免許を取り上げられた。He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.
6. to deliver (a baby)
7. to collect (taxes)

sentences.translation: She picked up one of the glass vases.
This blog covers topics that centre on information infrastructure.
All the papers featured the case.
He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to cancel; to withdraw; to retract; to take back (words, etc.); to revoke
取消す 【とりけす】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to cancel; to withdraw; to retract; to take back (words, etc.); to revoke
取消す 【とりけす】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take out; to produce; to pick out もう一つの面白いエネルギー源は、放射能の廃棄物質から取り出せる熱である。Another interesting source of energy is the heat that can be recovered from radioactive waste material.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to fetch; to retrieve 適合率とは取り出した記事のうち、どの程度の記事が検索条件に合っているかを示す指標です。The precision ratio is an index that indicates how many articles meet the search criteria out of all of the articles retrieved.
取出す 【とりだす】、取りだす 【とりだす】、とり出す 【とりだす】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take out; to produce; to pick out もう一つの面白いエネルギー源は、放射能の廃棄物質から取り出せる熱である。Another interesting source of energy is the heat that can be recovered from radioactive waste material.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to fetch; to retrieve 適合率とは取り出した記事のうち、どの程度の記事が検索条件に合っているかを示す指標です。The precision ratio is an index that indicates how many articles meet the search criteria out of all of the articles retrieved.
取出す 【とりだす】、取りだす 【とりだす】、とり出す 【とりだす】

sentences.translation: Another interesting source of energy is the heat that can be recovered from radioactive waste material.
The precision ratio is an index that indicates how many articles meet the search criteria out of all of the articles retrieved.

meanings.meaning: 1. to harvest; to reap Only applies to 取り入れる
2. to take in; to gather in Only applies to 取り入れる洗濯物を中へ取り入れて下さい。Please bring in the washing.
3. to adopt (e.g. an idea); to accept (e.g. advice); to introduce; to borrow (e.g. a word) 私達はいつも彼の忠告を取り入れるというわけではない。We do not always take his advice.
採り入れる 【とりいれる】
採り入れる: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to harvest; to reap Only applies to 取り入れる
2. to take in; to gather in Only applies to 取り入れる洗濯物を中へ取り入れて下さい。Please bring in the washing.
3. to adopt (e.g. an idea); to accept (e.g. advice); to introduce; to borrow (e.g. a word) 私達はいつも彼の忠告を取り入れるというわけではない。We do not always take his advice.
採り入れる 【とりいれる】
採り入れる: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: Please bring in the washing.
We do not always take his advice.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to receive; to get; to accept この贈り物は受け取れません。I cannot accept this gift.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to take (someone's words or behaviour); to interpret; to understand 彼女は私の言葉を侮辱と受け取ったようだ。She seems to have taken my remark as an insult.

sentences.translation: I cannot accept this gift.

meanings.meaning: 1. receiving; receipt
受け取り 【うけとり】、受取 【うけとり】、受け取 【うけとり】、請け取り 【うけとり】、請取り 【うけとり】、請取 【うけとり】、請け取 【うけとり】

meanings.meaning: 1. fixed date; appointed day

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take into one's possession; to receive; to accept; to collect; to claim 私は苦情を言ったが、店ではこのセーターを引き取るのを拒んだ。I complained, but they refused to take this sweater back.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to take into one's care (e.g. person, pet); to take custody of; to adopt 彼は戦災孤児をひきとって養女として育てています。He adopted a war orphan and is bringing her up as a foster daughter.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to leave; to go away; to withdraw; to get out
引取る 【ひきとる】、引きとる 【ひきとる】
引取る: Irregular okurigana usage.

sentences.translation: I complained, but they refused to take this sweater back.
He adopted a war orphan and is bringing her up as a foster daughter.
